route: From Mount Everest to Kilimanjaro via Antarctica.

alert.helpRequestText: I had an accident while hiking and need help. Below you find a description of my planned route.
procedureTodos: First try to reach me by phone: 123456789.
If I do not respond, please call the local emergency services.
Ask them for a mail-address and forward this mail to them.
If they have none, tell them my trail from description below.
IMPORTANT: when you could organize help, please send a response-mail. The MAIL-ID above must be contained in it. Sending RE-mail prevents further contacts to be notified.
alert.passingToNextText: As you did not respond in time, another alert has been sent to the next contact person. You can ignore the preceding mail.
